components.description:
A yellow face with an open mouth, the top of its head exploding in the shape of a brain-like mushroom cloud. A visual form of the expression mind blown, it may represent such emotions as shock, awe, amazement, and disbelief.

title: Shocked Face with Exploding Head

version.description:
Unicode 10.0 is the version of the Unicode Standard released on June 20, 2017. 8,518 new characters were included with this update, of which 56 were emoji characters.

Only new emoji code points are listed on this page. For the full 2017 emoji list; see Emoji 5.0 which included all 239 emoji additions including sequences for skin tone and gender.

  • ðŸ˜ƒ Emoji 5.0 list

apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the exploding head emoji is a striking visual metaphor for overwhelming shock or a mind-blowing realization, depicted with a stylized head bursting with vibrant, energetic particles.  Appleâ€™s signature glossy 3D shading and dynamic lighting create a sense of explosive motion and intense reaction.  The soft rounded edges of the head contrast with the sharp, scattered elements, effectively conveying the feeling of being stunned, amazed, or having one's perspective dramatically shifted in digital conversations.
